column4: Hello,  I have windows 7 installed on my desktop, I was wondering if there are any conflicting issues if I want to dual boot it with Ubuntu 9.10
you should be good to go
i have heard about a lot of people having grub issues, would you know naything about it?
I've heard of some issues but thats with GRUB2. From what I'm understanding it may be that it's not chainloading into windows
I dont dualboot though so I really don't know
true, does ubuntu give an option between grub and grub2?
if you're doing a fresh karmic install, it does not
hrm, weary of installing it then, haha.
though I'm sure you can downgrade once you're installed
I'm sure there are some workarounds in Launchpad already, I'd have a look
will do, ty for some good info
one more thing, is there a 64bit 9.10?
